Package org.apache.wayang.core.optimizer.cardinality

Interface CardinalityEstimator

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AggregatingCardinalityEstimator, AmazonS3Source.CardinalityEstimator, AzureBlobStorageSource.CardinalityEstimator, DefaultCardinalityEstimator, FallbackCardinalityEstimator, FixedSizeCardinalityEstimator, GoogleCloudStorageSource.CardinalityEstimator, KafkaTopicSource.CardinalityEstimator, ObjectFileSource.CardinalityEstimator, ParquetSource.CardinalityEstimator, SwitchForwardCardinalityEstimator, TextFileSource.CardinalityEstimator
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface CardinalityEstimator extends Serializable
Computes CardinalityEstimates.

To estimate the cardinality of an Operator's OutputSlot given its InputSlots' cardinalities is the job of this estimator.
